alert.note: Alert for Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 7:08PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Winneshiek, southwestern Winona, northwestern Houston and Fillmore Counties through 745 PM CST... At 707 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Preston, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lanesboro around 720 PM CST. Rushford around 735 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Forestville State Park, Choice, County Roads 6 And 33, Wyattville, Isinours, Hutton, Fillmore, Utica, Peterson and Rushford Village. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 236 and 246. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
